item.title: Medtronic plc 10-K
item.description: Medtronic plc, which is in the Electromedical & Electrotherapeutic Apparatus [3845] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 23, 2022 had 43419 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: medtronic - 416 instances 2022 - 410 instances fiscal - 381 instances company - 370 instances year - 364 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
